mapper.select: SELECT movie_reply.id AS id, movie_reply.content AS content, movie_reply.reply_user_id AS reply_user_id, -- 回复评论的用户 movie_reply.comment_user_id AS comment_user_id, -- 评论的用户 movie_reply.parent_reply_id AS parent_reply_id, movie_reply.like_count AS like_count, movie_reply.unlike_count AS dislike_count, movie_reply.create_time AS create_time, movie_reply.update_time AS update_time, movie_reply.movie_comment_id AS movie_comment_id, commentUser.name AS comment_user_name, -- 评论用户的用户名 commentUser.cover AS comment_user_avatar, replyUser.name AS reply_user_name, -- 回复用户的用户名 replyUser.cover AS reply_user_avatar FROM movie_reply LEFT JOIN users AS commentUser ON movie_reply.comment_user_id = commentUser.id LEFT JOIN users AS replyUser ON movie_reply.reply_user_id = replyUser.id WHERE movie_reply.deleted = 0 AND movie_reply.movie_comment_id = #{query.commentId} ORDER BY movie_reply.update_time DESC
